name: ARTG 120
title: Game Design Experience
description: Teaches the concrete skills associated with making a digital game, from start to finish. Activities include establishing a team, concepting, storyboarding, prototyping, producing, and testing a game for release. Students are organized into groups and work together to create and produce a playable game.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): ARTG 80I and FILM 80V, or CMPM 80K and CSE 30.Enrollment is restricted to juniors and seniors.

class_notes: CSGD Students: Concurrent enrollment in CMPM 120-01 is required. Please enroll in the lecture and associated discussion section. AGPM Students: -If you have taken ARTG 80G then you will not need to enroll in CMPM 120-01. Only ARTG 120 and an associated discussion section. -Pre-Fall 2022 students if you haven't taken ARTG 80G and are planning on CMPM 35/ have taken CMPM 35. Concurrent enrollment in CMPM 120-01 is required. Please enroll in the lecture and associated discussion section." AGPM Students: Please emailagpmadv@ucsc.edufor questions on whether or not you need both courses. "
